{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question describes an increase in the number of acinar glands in the breast tissue of pregnant women compared to non-pregnant women. This indicates an increase in the number of cells, which is a process known as hyperplasia. Hypertrophy refers to an increase in the size of cells, not the number. Atrophy refers to a decrease in the size or number of cells. Metaplasia refers to a change in the type of cells.", "answer_choice": "A"}
